content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option the english title of the pattern is **dreaming of happiness** unelma onnesta dreaming of happiness sock pattern was designed for roosa nauha pink ribbon campaign in 2017 to raise funds for cancer research if you feel that the pattern is worth a dime or two please consider making a small donation to any cancer research project of your choice --- **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts and large 72 sts - folded picot cuff and contrast coloured french heel - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/b/7yjp
